current_company.title: Engineer III @ American Express | IIT Kharagpur' 2023

experience.title: Modelling and Analysis of Automotive Lightening System
experience.description: • Created a 3D Mathematical model of Total Internal Reflection Lens in MATLAB to be used by Lightblades in car's tail lights• Surface sag and Scatter plots of all the aspheric surfaces were compared to decide the best suited outer structure for TIR lens• Developed Illuminance Uniformity Algorithm to optimize the parameters of TIR Lens for collimating light• Harnessed 80% Uniformity using Gaussian Curve Fitting technique and obtained desired Spread Control after optimization
experience.description_html: • Created a 3D Mathematical model of Total Internal Reflection Lens in MATLAB to be used by Lightblades in car's tail lights• Surface sag and Scatter plots of all the aspheric surfaces were compared to decide the best suited outer structure for TIR lens• Developed Illuminance Uniformity Algorithm to optimize the parameters of TIR Lens for collimating light• Harnessed 80% Uniformity using Gaussian Curve Fitting technique and obtained desired Spread Control after optimization <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: • Worked on ideas associated with Energy Harvesting from Automotive Vehicles• Formulated an efficient solution and innovated new methodologies and techniques in a cost-effective manner
experience.description_html: • Worked on ideas associated with Energy Harvesting from Automotive Vehicles• Formulated an efficient solution and innovated new methodologies and techniques in a cost-effective manner <!---->

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: • Developed the Admin dashboard frontend using React.js to perform administrative tasks and effectively manage user activities• Created a Django web app to automate media posting on Facebook using the Graph API which increased the reach by 115%• Implemented the method of task queues using Celery and Redis to schedule automated mails to the applicants in the background• Scrapped user information of over 70k applicants from Facebook groups and pages using Selenium Webdriver in Python
